summary: This is an email exchange from March 2002 between 'G. Max' and 'The Invisible Man' discussing arranging a trip to Peru for 'Andrew' to see the Nazca Lines, with an emphasis on providing '2 legged sight seeing' (interpreted as companionship with 'intelligent pretty fun' women from 'good families') and ensuring discretion to avoid media attention.

persons.name: G. Max
persons.context: Sends an email to 'The Invisible Man' detailing plans for 'Andrew's' trip to Peru, emphasizing the need for discreet companionship and fun.

persons.name: The Invisible Man
persons.role: Email recipient and planned tour guide
persons.context: Receives the email from G. Max, is tasked with showing Andrew a wonderful time in Peru, including arranging social introductions.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: An English gentleman whose trip to Peru to see the Nazca Lines is being arranged; preferences and need for discretion are discussed.

connections.description: G. Max is communicating with The Invisible Man to arrange a trip for Andrew, indicating a level of trust and personal connection (sign-off with 'Besos').
G. Max is arranging a personal trip for Andrew, knows his preferences (riding, discretion), and has provided his telephone number.
The Invisible Man is expected to be Andrew's tour guide in Peru and provide introductions to trusted, discreet friends.

events.title: Email planning Andrew's Peru trip
events.description: G. Max emails The Invisible Man detailing plans for Andrew's upcoming trip to Peru to see the Nazca Lines, including arrangements for social companionship and emphasis on discretion.

keyFacts: The email discusses arranging a trip to Peru for 'Andrew' to see the Nazca Lines.
The trip planning includes a reference to '2 legged sight seeing' described as 'intelligent pretty fun and from good families', implying arranged social companionship.
There is a strong emphasis on discretion, with instructions that Andrew 'does not want to read about any trip in the papers'.
The correspondence suggests a network facilitating travel and social introductions for wealthy or influential individuals.
